channel.title: Data Analysis on Running on R

item.title: Earnings Sentiment Analysis Part 2: Using Machine Learning
item.description: Earnings Sentiment Analysis Part 2 From a post of mine earlier this year, I wanted to do a continuation post that is long due. I did not want to rush it as I was touching on more advanced material regarding machine learning methods to score sentiment from an earnings transcript. I also became really busy but without further a due.
